books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The struggling detective Cormoran Strike investigates a supermodel’s suicide; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE CUCKOO'S CALLING

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, an art restorer and occasional spy for the Israeli secret service, steps in to help the British prime minister, whose lover has been kidnapped.
books.name: THE ENGLISH GIRL

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A talented American designer whose troubled past has soured her on relationships falls in love with a French doctor.
books.name: FIRST SIGHT

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: In the second book of a trilogy, the forensic sculptor Eve Duncan struggles to elude a kidnapper in the Colorado wilderness.
books.name: HUNTING EVE

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: The F.B.I. agent John O’Hara investigates the murder of a pair of newlyweds.
books.name: SECOND HONEYMOON

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: The counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath uncovers a plot with roots in the 18th century.
books.name: HIDDEN ORDER

books.author: by Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A multigenerational family saga centers on a brother and sister born in Afghanistan.
books.name: AND THE MOUNTAINS ECHOED

books.author: by Gail McHugh
books.description: In a sequel to “Collide,” Emily Cooper risks everything on her romance with the playboy Gavin Blake.
books.name: PULSE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Shayla Black and others
books.description: Seven books by seven authors about bad boys and the women who love them.
books.name: ALPHA BAD BOYS

books.author: by Catherine Coulter
books.description: The F.B.I. special agent Griffin Hammersmith accepts Dillon Savich’s invitation to join him and Lacey Sherlock.
books.name: BOMBSHELL

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: In this short story, Jo Marie Rose readies her bed-and-breakfast for spring.
books.name: LOST AND FOUND IN CEDAR COVE

books.author: by Neil Gaiman
books.description: A middle-aged man recalls his lonely boyhood and his friendship with a remarkable girl.
books.name: THE OCEAN AT THE END OF THE LANE

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME
